titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2926) to preserve the continued viability of the United States air transportation system.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-214, by Mr. Reynolds.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2926 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 76.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 244.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 285 - 130 (Roll no. 346).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/21/2001--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 2926 (preserving the continued viability of the U.S. air transportation system).
